name: document-intelligence-service
description: Document Intelligence Service with Hidden Dangerous Goods and Customs Portal modules

scripts.dev:backend: cd document-intelligence-backend && poetry run fastapi dev app/main.py
scripts.install:all: cd document-intelligence-frontend && npm install && cd ../document-intelligence-backend && poetry install
scripts.clean: cd document-intelligence-frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../document-intelligence-backend && rm -rf .venv

author: Alex Casquete
